sect2.title: Installation of Courier
sect2.para: Before you compile the program, you need to create users and groups that will be expected to be in place when the install script executes. Add the users and groups with the following commands:

userinput.command: groupadd courier && useradd -c 'Courier Mail Server' -d /dev/null -g courier -s /bin/false courier

sect2.para: You also need to create a bin user. If you already have a user named bin this step can be safely ignored.
